channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- Cumulus Linux
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- Cumulus Linux

item.title: CVE-2023-25526|2024-08-02T11:25:18.685Z -- nvidia -- cumulus%20linux
item.description: NVIDIA Cumulus Linux contains a vulnerability in neighmgrd and nlmanager where an attacker on an adjacent network may cause an uncaught exception by injecting a crafted packet. A successful exploit may lead to denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2023-25525|2024-08-02T11:25:18.555Z -- nvidia -- cumulus%20linux
item.description: NVIDIA Cumulus Linux contains a vulnerability in forwarding where a VxLAN-encapsulated IPv6 packet received on an SVI interface with DMAC/DIPv6 set to the link-local address of the SVI interface may be incorrectly forwarded. A successful exploit may lead to information disclosure.
